about_the_game:
Invasion Rush is a hero-based game in which you will travel through different maps, beating enemies, collecting weapons, ammo and upgrades to get stronger and try to get the furthest possible.

Features

  • Roguelite replayability: courses are randomly generated, once you reach milestones you can start adding difficulty modifiers.
  • Weekly ranking, try to reach the top in Solo or Squad runs and get rewards!
  • Unlock up to 6 survivors available at release date, each one with their unique skill and gameplay style.
  • Play with up to 3 friends and build a team composition that can get you through the challenge.
  • Level up your survivors, pick skills from their skill-tree according to your strategy and get the most out of each one.
  • Play on different event themed raids with unique rewards: exclusive alternative version of other survivors, limited-time cosmetic accesories, etc.

* Game is yet in early development stage, stay tuned for more updates! :)

content_descriptors.notes: Game mentions use of alcohol and tobacco in some random occurring dialogues.

detailed_description:

  • Weekly ranking, try to reach the top in Solo or Squad runs and get rewards!
  • Unlock up to 6 survivors available at release date, each one with their unique skill and gameplay style.
  • Play with up to 3 friends and build a team composition that can get you through the challenge.
  • Level up your survivors, pick skills from their skill-tree according to your strategy and get the most out of each one.
  • Play on different event themed raids with unique rewards: exclusive alternative version of other survivors, limited-time cosmetic accesories, etc.

legal_notice: By now there are a lot of placeholder assets and they WILL change to comply with permissions, licenses and copyright holding.

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Recommended:

short_description: An apocalyptic disaster has left the door open for all kind of creatures to invade our home! Jump right into action in this hero-top down shooter-coop-roguelite experience, power up your survivors, defeat bosses and try to see how far you can get!
